## MeasurementParameters interface

Optional parameters passed on \[\[TextCanvas\]\].`measureText` function call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MeasurementParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [letterCaseArray](./harp-text-canvas.measurementparameters.lettercasearray.md) | boolean\[\] | Array containing info on whether the glyphs are upper or lower case. Needed to support <code>SmallCaps</code>. |
|  [outputCharacterBounds](./harp-text-canvas.measurementparameters.outputcharacterbounds.md) | THREE.Box2\[\] | Output per-character bounds. |
|  [path](./harp-text-canvas.measurementparameters.path.md) | THREE.Path \| THREE.CurvePath&lt;THREE.Vector2&gt; | Path where text should be placed on. Overrides the original position parameter. |
|  [pathOverflow](./harp-text-canvas.measurementparameters.pathoverflow.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, text on a path will be placed even when its size its bigger than the path's size. |
